ML_Class module¶

Created on Thu Feb 6 12:54:45 2020 @author: Donovan @modified

class ML_Class.ML_Model(train_data, ml_classifier, preprocess)¶

Bases: object

This class creates a machine learning model based on the data sent, data preprocessing, and type of ml classifier.

predict_test_image(test_images)¶

This function predicts the labels for a new set of test data that does not contains labels. It returns these predictions and the probability. :param test_images: The new data to be labeled. :type test_images: pandas DataFrame

Returns

  • y_prediction (list) – list of predicted labels.

  • prob (list) – The probability that the label is correct.

predict_train_image()¶

This function predicts the labels for a new set of train data that contains user labels. It returns these predictions and the probability.

X¶

The features in the train set.

Type

pandas DataFrame

ml_model¶
Type

Trained RandomForrest model.

Returns

  • y_prediction (list) – list of predicted labels.

  • prob (list) – The probability that the label is correct.
